title: Gunder Frank vs David Christian Secondary MCQ 4

content.question: Which of the following earlier developments contributed most directly to the importance of the Asian market during the early modern period as described by both passages?

choices.label: The commercialization of the Chinese economy under the Song and Ming dynasties
The conquest of India by Muslim Turks and Afghans
The increased trade along the Silk Roads encouraged by the Mongol conquests in Eurasia
The spread of Confucian ideas to areas of East and Southeast Asia outside China

content.answer: The commercialization of the Chinese economy under the Song and Ming dynasties

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
